<white><#e5e5e5>Bhalwyn's gelid body becomes the latest in a long string of macabre masterpieces wrought by Irra's brutal hand.
<#e5e5e5>You divine the location of this death as Shadow-filled chamber in an unstable section of Tiyen Esityi.
